    • Method Detail

      • pagePreviewRequestObject

        public static BoxImageRequestObject pagePreviewRequestObject(int page,
                                             int minWidth,
                                             int maxWidth,
                                             int minHeight,
                                             int maxHeight)
        Get BoxImageRequestObject for a preview request with pages.
        Parameters:
        page - requested preview page number(For example, 2 if you want to get the 2nd page of the preview if the preview has multiple pages.)
        minWidth - minimum width of the preview image requested
        maxWidth - maximum width of the preview image requested
        minHeight - minimum height of the preview image requested
        maxHeight - maximum height of the preview image requested
        Returns:
        BoxPreviewRequestObject

      • previewRequestObject

        public static BoxImageRequestObject previewRequestObject()
        Get BoxImageRequestObject for an image or preview request without pages.
        Returns:
        BoxPreviewRequestObject
